thought: The website is accessible. Next, I should extract the text from the page to look for any of the scam characteristics mentioned, like unusually low prices or implausible claims about money.
observation: Canton IL CPA  1 Home Firm profile Client services Staff Resources Contact us Account access Careers Hocker, Fitzjarrald & Richardson, PC is a Canton, IL CPA firm. Thank you for visiting our website. Our dedication to quality client service has brought us to the Internet as we endeavor to provide the highest quality professional service and guidance. We've designed this website as a "one-stop shop" to provide information about our firm, our staff and the services we offer. Our website features the following pages, developed to keep you up-to-date and informed: FIRM PROFILE - Visit this page to learn more about the Canton, IL CPA firm's history, personnel & mission statement. CLIENT SERVICES - Find out more about the wide range of services we offer and our various areas of specialization. STAFF - Meet our professional staff. RESOURCES - There are a lot of great web sites out there - if you can find them! Use this page to link to some useful sites that we have found. CONTACT INFORMATION Robert R. Fitzjarrald, CPA, Joshua S. Richardson, CPA; Peggy A. Roberts, CPA; Paula L. Arrenholz; Carla J. Spotser, Tabitha Watson. Website Designed Create a Website List Your Business

thought: The extracted text seems to indicate that this is a CPA (certified public accountant) firm's website, offering professional services. There's no immediate sign of unusually low prices, implausible claims about money, or targeting of psychological weaknesses. It seems legitimate at first glance, but more analysis is required.

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain is registered and has a history dating back to 2000, with the registration in the state of Illinois, which matches the information on the website. The domain has standard status codes indicating it is not under any special restrictions or holds. The privacy for registrant details is redacted, which is common for privacy reasons. There are no immediate red flags here. To further ensure the legitimacy of the website, I should verify if the business is recognized outside of its own domain and check for any unusual payment methods or complaints about the site.

thought: The search results show that the firm Hocker, Fitzjarrald & Richardson, PC has a presence on Glassdoor and Yelp, which are reputable sites for company reviews and employee feedback. The firm is also listed on a CPA directory with a physical address in Illinois. These observations suggest that the firm is known and has a presence outside its website. I now know the final answer. The URL https://www.hockercpa.com/ does not appear to be a scam website.

observation.reason: The firm has a legitimate presence on review sites such as Glassdoor and Yelp is listed in CPA directories and the WHOIS information shows a long-standing domain registration. There are no indicators of scam characteristics such as unusually low prices implausible claims about money psychological manipulation or non-existent companies. The firm appears to be a legitimate CPA firm offering professional services.
